name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven .NET Developer with 8+ years in software engineering, I excel in developing and implementing high-performance applications using **.NET**, **C#**, **.NET Core**, and **ASP.NET Web API**. My strong expertise in building secure, scalable **RESTful APIs** and microservices architecture ensures seamless integration and enhanced functionality across systems. Proficient in **SQL Server**, **Entity Framework**, and **LINQ**, I deliver reliable database solutions optimized for performance. Additionally, I possess solid experience with frontend technologies like **Angular**, **React**, and **Blazor**, as well as tools for continuous integration and deployment including **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. My collaborative and agile approach—honed through practices like **Agile** and **Scrum**—coupled with strong problem-solving and communication skills, equips me to effectively contribute to team success.
